definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: Coach of the swimming class is two men and one woman, I follow the woman coach freestyle.
sentences.chinese: 游泳班的教練是兩男一女，我跟那位女教練學自由泳。

sentences.english: The Freestyler Paddle is a patented hand paddle designed to improve technique specifically for the freestyle stroke.
sentences.chinese: 自由泳手璞是爲提高自由泳划水技巧和效率而設計的。

sentences.english: The Freestyler Paddle is a patented hand paddle designed to improve technique specifically for the freestyle stroke.
sentences.chinese: 自由泳手璞是爲提高自由泳划水技巧和效率而設計的。

sentences.english: In fact, Stun Gun is a great 6-beat-kick drill for freestyle.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，端槍練習是訓練自由泳六次打腿的極好練習。

sentences.english: A - I am sorry we did not get tickets to the 100 meter freestyle event.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我們買不到100米自由泳比賽的，門票。

sentences.english: Hao Weixing 18 works on his freestyle during training.
sentences.chinese: 郝衛星，18日，在訓練期間，他的自由泳。

sentences.english: The second element to the free-style stroke is breathing.
sentences.chinese: 自由泳的第二個要素是呼吸。

definition: stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
to tread water/to paddle or tramp in shallow water
